CONTACT
Contact Us
Whether you have questions about our menu, want to book a fundraiser, or need more information about our events, feel free to reach out. We’re here to make your experience at JT's Sports Bar & Grill the best it can be.
We are online

HEAD RT JS Include
End of HEAD RT JS Include
photoswipe markup
Root element of PhotoSwipe. Must have class pswp.
Background of PhotoSwipe. 
         It's a separate element as animating opacity is faster than rgba().
Slides wrapper with overflow:hidden.
Container that holds slides. 
            PhotoSwipe keeps only 3 of them in the DOM to save memory.
            Don't modify these 3 pswp__item elements, data is added later on.
Default (PhotoSwipeUI_Default) interface on top of sliding area. Can be changed.
Controls are self-explanatory. Order can be changed.
Preloader demo http://codepen.io/dimsemenov/pen/yyBWoR
element will get class pswp__preloader--active when preloader is running
Alias: 26b5e0b2
Share by:

ABOUT
About us
JT's Sports Bar & Grill
For 16 years, JT's Sports Bar & Grill has been a beloved local hotspot in Pembroke Pines. As a small business, we are dedicated to supporting the community that comes together here to enjoy great food, drinks, and live sports. Established in 2008, we’ve built a reputation for delivering an unforgettable dining experience that caters to everyone—families, sports fans, and friends looking to relax. Whether you’re here for a meal or to catch the latest game, we’re committed to providing a welcoming and fun atmosphere.
Our Mission
At JT's, our mission is simple: to create a space where everyone feels at home. From our family-friendly dining options to our lively sports viewing experience, we aim to offer something for everyone.
What Sets Us Apart
Quality Ingredients
: Our menu is crafted using only the freshest and highest-quality ingredients. From our juicy burgers to our legendary wings, every dish is made with care to ensure you enjoy the best flavors in town.
Community Focused
: As a locally owned and operated business, we take pride in supporting the
Pembroke Pines
community. We participate in local events, sponsor local sports teams, and contribute to charitable initiatives, because we believe in giving back to the community that has supported us for so many years.
Exceptional Service
: Our dedicated staff is here to make sure every visit is a memorable one. Whether you're dining in with family, hanging out with friends, or stopping by to catch the game, our friendly team is always ready to provide top-notch service.
Why JT's is the Perfect Place for You
Whether you're a sports fan eager to catch every moment of live action on our
multiple TV screens
, or a family looking for a fun, casual dining experience, JT's Sports Bar & Grill is the place to be. With our unbeatable
happy hour specials
, variety of
craft beers and wines
, and a menu full of delicious, crowd-pleasing favorites, there's something for everyone.
We invite you to join us in continuing our journey as we serve the
Pembroke Pines
community with pride and dedication. Whether you're coming in to watch your favorite sports team, enjoy a meal with loved ones, or simply unwind with a drink, JT's Sports Bar & Grill is the spot for you!
CONTACT US
© All rights reserved | JT's Sports Bar & Grill | Designed by
